title: Tech Team Lead
description: Delivered 10 completed projects with global teams, including documentation of a Discord bot that combats spam and fake users, and a Django-based web application for permission management for 100 users.

title: Technical Product Marketing Intern
description:
Presented strategy to better distributor margin management and improve earned profits by $250,000.
Conducted a market survey on types of optical transceivers used in AI networking infrastructure to identify potential customers for MEMS timing chips.
Created Visio diagrams for the product requirements document for a timing chip.
